branchCategory.name: ZQ
branchCategory.description: <p>Vacuum Generator&nbsp;series ZQ is designed for high speed break response handling applications.&nbsp; The ZQ series&nbsp;can be used as a stand alone generator, or as part of a vacuum pump system. The ZQ not only offers a light weight, compact design (10mm body width), but also includes options such as filtration, pressure switches, and vacuum break (blow off valve).</p>
